paragraph: Call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Legal Team

valueProp: Jan Mulligan is a highly respected attorney with over 30 years of experience in healthcare law, dedicated to providing exceptional legal representation.

testimonalData.text: Jan Mulligan is a skilled attorney who truly cares about her clients. She fought tirelessly for my case and achieved a great outcome.

testimonalData.text: I highly recommend Mulligan Law. Their expertise in healthcare law is unmatched, and they provide top-notch legal services.

testimonalData.text: Janice Mulligan is a compassionate and dedicated lawyer. She goes above and beyond to ensure her clients receive the best representation.
